actions.name: Check if the clipboard changed
actions.script:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd">
<plist version="1.0">
<array>
	<dict>
		<key>ActionName</key>
		<string>Check if the clipboard changed</string>
		<key>Actions</key>
		<array>
			<dict>
				<key>MacroActionType</key>
				<string>SetVariableToCalculation</string>
				<key>Text</key>
				<string>CLIPBOARDSEED()</string>
				<key>UseFormat</key>
				<false/>
				<key>Variable</key>
				<string>CBSeedBefore</string>
			</dict>
			<dict>
				<key>ActionColor</key>
				<string>Magenta</string>
				<key>ActionName</key>
				<string>USE ⌘C with Short Pause</string>
				<key>Actions</key>
				<array>
					<dict>
						<key>KeyCode</key>
						<integer>8</integer>
						<key>MacroActionType</key>
						<string>SimulateKeystroke</string>
						<key>Modifiers</key>
						<integer>256</integer>
						<key>ReleaseAll</key>
						<false/>
						<key>TargetApplication</key>
						<dict/>
						<key>TargetingType</key>
						<string>Front</string>
					</dict>
					<dict>
						<key>ActionName</key>
						<string>Set a PAUSE Long Enough for the App to Complete the COPY</string>
						<key>MacroActionType</key>
						<string>Pause</string>
						<key>Time</key>
						<string>0.5</string>
						<key>TimeOutAbortsMacro</key>
						<true/>
					</dict>
				</array>
				<key>MacroActionType</key>
				<string>Group</string>
				<key>TimeOutAbortsMacro</key>
				<true/>
			</dict>
			<dict>
				<key>MacroActionType</key>
				<string>SetVariableToCalculation</string>
				<key>Text</key>
				<string>CLIPBOARDSEED()</string>
				<key>UseFormat</key>
				<false/>
				<key>Variable</key>
				<string>CBSeedAfter</string>
			</dict>
			<dict>
				<key>ActionColor</key>
				<string>Yellow</string>
				<key>Conditions</key>
				<dict>
					<key>ConditionList</key>
					<array>
						<dict>
							<key>ConditionType</key>
							<string>Variable</string>
							<key>Variable</key>
							<string>CBSeedAfter</string>
							<key>VariableConditionType</key>
							<string>IsNot</string>
							<key>VariableValue</key>
							<string>%Variable%CBSeedBefore%</string>
						</dict>
					</array>
					<key>ConditionListMatch</key>
					<string>All</string>
				</dict>
				<key>ElseActions</key>
				<array>
					<dict>
						<key>Action</key>
						<string>DisplayWindow</string>
						<key>MacroActionType</key>
						<string>InsertText</string>
						<key>StyledText</key>
						<data>
						cnRmZAAAAAADAAAAAgAAAAcAAABU
						WFQucnRmAQAAAC41AQAAKwAAAAEA
						AAAtAQAAe1xydGYxXGFuc2lcYW5z
						aWNwZzEyNTJcY29jb2FydGYxNDA0
						XGNvY29hc3VicnRmNDcwCntcZm9u
						dHRibFxmMFxmbmlsXGZjaGFyc2V0
						MCBIZWx2ZXRpY2FOZXVlO30Ke1xj
						b2xvcnRibDtccmVkMjU1XGdyZWVu
						MjU1XGJsdWUyNTU7fQpccGFyZFx0
						eDU2MFx0eDExMjBcdHgxNjgwXHR4
						MjI0MFx0eDI4MDBcdHgzMzYwXHR4
						MzkyMFx0eDQ0ODBcdHg1MDQwXHR4
						NTYwMFx0eDYxNjBcdHg2NzIwXHBh
						cmRpcm5hdHVyYWxccGFydGlnaHRl
						bmZhY3RvcjAKClxmMFxmczI2IFxj
						ZjAgVGhlIENsaXBib2FyZCBoYXMg
						Tk9UIENIQU5HRUQufQEAAAAjAAAA
						AQAAAAcAAABUWFQucnRmEAAAAKuG
						nVm2AQAAAAAAAAAAAAA=
						</data>
						<key>Text</key>
						<string>The Clipboard has NOT CHANGED.</string>
					</dict>
				</array>
				<key>MacroActionType</key>
				<string>IfThenElse</string>
				<key>ThenActions</key>
				<array>
					<dict>
						<key>Action</key>
						<string>DisplayWindow</string>
						<key>MacroActionType</key>
						<string>InsertText</string>
						<key>StyledText</key>
						<data>
						cnRmZAAAAAADAAAAAgAAAAcAAABU
						WFQucnRmAQAAAC4xAQAAKwAAAAEA
						AAApAQAAe1xydGYxXGFuc2lcYW5z
						aWNwZzEyNTJcY29jb2FydGYxNDA0
						XGNvY29hc3VicnRmNDcwCntcZm9u
						dHRibFxmMFxmbmlsXGZjaGFyc2V0
						MCBIZWx2ZXRpY2FOZXVlO30Ke1xj
						b2xvcnRibDtccmVkMjU1XGdyZWVu
						MjU1XGJsdWUyNTU7fQpccGFyZFx0
						eDU2MFx0eDExMjBcdHgxNjgwXHR4
						MjI0MFx0eDI4MDBcdHgzMzYwXHR4
						MzkyMFx0eDQ0ODBcdHg1MDQwXHR4
						NTYwMFx0eDYxNjBcdHg2NzIwXHBh
						cmRpcm5hdHVyYWxccGFydGlnaHRl
						bmZhY3RvcjAKClxmMFxmczI2IFxj
						ZjAgVGhlIENsaXBib2FyZCBIQVMg
						Q0hBTkdFRC59AQAAACMAAAABAAAA
						BwAAAFRYVC5ydGYQAAAAq4adWbYB
						AAAAAAAAAAAAAA==
						</data>
						<key>Text</key>
						<string>The Clipboard HAS CHANGED.</string>
					</dict>
				</array>
				<key>TimeOutAbortsMacro</key>
				<true/>
			</dict>
			<dict>
				<key>ActionColor</key>
				<string>Orange</string>
				<key>IsDisclosed</key>
				<false/>
				<key>MacroActionType</key>
				<string>SetVariableToText</string>
				<key>Text</key>
				<string>%Delete%</string>
				<key>Variable</key>
				<string>CBSeedBefore</string>
			</dict>
			<dict>
				<key>ActionColor</key>
				<string>Orange</string>
				<key>IsDisclosed</key>
				<false/>
				<key>MacroActionType</key>
				<string>SetVariableToText</string>
				<key>Text</key>
				<string>%Delete%</string>
				<key>Variable</key>
				<string>CBSeedAfter</string>
			</dict>
		</array>
		<key>MacroActionType</key>
		<string>Group</string>
		<key>TimeOutAbortsMacro</key>
		<true/>
	</dict>
</array>
</plist>

actions.name: Edit current safari url
actions.script:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd">
<plist version="1.0">
<array>
	<dict>
		<key>Argument</key>
		<string>%SafariURL%</string>
		<key>Command</key>
		<string>SetDocumentURL</string>
		<key>MacroActionType</key>
		<string>SafariControl</string>
		<key>TimeOutAbortsMacro</key>
		<true/>
		<key>WebBrowser</key>
		<string>Safari</string>
	</dict>
</array>
</plist>

actions.name: Focus on macros group
actions.script:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd">
<plist version="1.0">
<array>
	<dict>
		<key>ActionName</key>
		<string>Focus on macros group</string>
		<key>DisplayKind</key>
		<string>None</string>
		<key>IncludeStdErr</key>
		<true/>
		<key>MacroActionType</key>
		<string>ExecuteAppleScript</string>
		<key>NotifyOnFailure</key>
		<false/>
		<key>Path</key>
		<string></string>
		<key>StopOnFailure</key>
		<false/>
		<key>Text</key>
		<string>try		tell application "System Events"		tell application process "Keyboard Maestro"			tell window "Keyboard Maestro Editor"				tell scroll area 2 of splitter group 1 of group 1					set focused to true				end tell			end tell		end tell	end tell	on error e number n	set e to e & return & return & "Num: " & n	if n ≠ -128 then		try			tell application (path to frontmost application as text) to set ddButton to button returned of ¬				(display dialog e with title "ERROR!" buttons {"Copy Error Message", "Cancel", "OK"} ¬					default button "OK" giving up after 30)			if ddButton = "Copy Error Message" then set the clipboard to e		end try	end ifend try-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------</string>
		<key>TimeOutAbortsMacro</key>
		<true/>
		<key>TrimResults</key>
		<true/>
		<key>TrimResultsNew</key>
		<true/>
		<key>UseText</key>
		<true/>
	</dict>
</array>
</plist>

actions.name: Get current Safari URL
actions.script:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd">

		<key>MacroActionType</key>

		<string></string>

		<key>TrimResults</key>
		<true/>
		<key>TrimResultsNew</key>
		<true/>
		<key>UseText</key>

	</dict>
</array>
</plist>

actions.name: Get path of selected finder files
actions.script:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd">
<plist version="1.0">
<array>
	<dict>
		<key>ActionName</key>
		<string>Get path of selected finder files</string>
		<key>DisplayKind</key>
		<string>None</string>
		<key>IncludeStdErr</key>
		<true/>
		<key>MacroActionType</key>
		<string>ExecuteAppleScript</string>
		<key>NotifyOnFailure</key>
		<false/>
		<key>Path</key>
		<string></string>
		<key>StopOnFailure</key>
		<false/>
		<key>Text</key>
		<string>  tell application "Finder"
	set theItems to selection
	set filePath to (POSIX path of (the selection as alias))
  end tell
  set the clipboard to filePath</string>
		<key>TimeOutAbortsMacro</key>
		<true/>
		<key>TrimResults</key>
		<true/>
		<key>TrimResultsNew</key>
		<true/>
		<key>UseText</key>
		<true/>
	</dict>
</array>
</plist>

actions.name: Go to a macro
actions.script:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd">
<plist version="1.0">
<array>
	<dict>
		<key>ActionName</key>
		<string>Go to a macro</string>
		<key>DisplayKind</key>
		<string>None</string>
		<key>IncludeStdErr</key>
		<false/>
		<key>MacroActionType</key>
		<string>ExecuteAppleScript</string>
		<key>NotifyOnFailure</key>
		<false/>
		<key>Path</key>
		<string></string>
		<key>StopOnFailure</key>
		<false/>
		<key>Text</key>
		<string>try
   
   ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   # User Settings:
   ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   set macroGroupName to "a:general"
   set macroName to "test"
   ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   
   tell application "Keyboard Maestro"
      
      ------------------------------------------------------------------------
      # Make sure the designated macro group and macro exist.
      # Create one or both of them as necessary.
      ------------------------------------------------------------------------
      
      if (exists of macro group macroGroupName) = false then
         set newGroup to make new macro group with properties {name:macroGroupName}
         select newGroup
      end if
      
      if (exists of macro macroName) = false then
         tell macro group macroGroupName
            set newMacro to make new macro with properties {name:macroName}
            select newMacro
            return --» script ends here IF a new macro is created.
         end tell
      end if
      
      ------------------------------------------------------------------------
      # Select the macro group if necessary.
      ------------------------------------------------------------------------
      
      if selected of macro group macroGroupName = false or length of (get selected macro groups) > 1 then
         select macro group macroGroupName
      end if
      
      ------------------------------------------------------------------------
      # Select the macro for editing.
      ------------------------------------------------------------------------
      
      editMacro macroName
      
      ------------------------------------------------------------------------
      
   end tell
   
on error e number n
   set e to e & return & return & "Num: " & n
   if n ≠ -128 then
      try
         tell application (path to frontmost application as text) to set ddButton to button returned of ¬
            (display dialog e with title "ERROR!" buttons {"Copy Error Message", "Cancel", "OK"} ¬
               default button "OK" giving up after 30)
         if ddButton = "Copy Error Message" then set the clipboard to e
      end try
   end if
end try

------------------------------------------------------------------------------</string>
		<key>TimeOutAbortsMacro</key>
		<true/>
		<key>TrimResults</key>
		<true/>
		<key>TrimResultsNew</key>
		<true/>
		<key>UseText</key>
		<true/>
	</dict>
</array>
</plist>

actions.name: If button
actions.script:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd">

					<key>ButtonConditionSelectionType</key>

					<string>Button</string>
				</dict>
			</array>
			<key>ConditionListMatch</key>

		</dict>

			</dict>
		</array>
		<key>TimeOutAbortsMacro</key>

	</dict>
</array>
</plist>

actions.name: If Safari URL contains text
actions.script:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd">
<plist version="1.0">
<array>
	<dict>
		<key>Conditions</key>
		<dict>
			<key>ConditionList</key>
			<array>
				<dict>
					<key>ConditionType</key>
					<string>Text</string>
					<key>Text</key>
					<string>%SafariURL%</string>
					<key>TextConditionType</key>
					<string>Contains</string>
					<key>TextValue</key>
					<string></string>
				</dict>
			</array>
			<key>ConditionListMatch</key>
			<string>All</string>
		</dict>
		<key>ElseActions</key>
		<array/>
		<key>MacroActionType</key>
		<string>IfThenElse</string>
		<key>ThenActions</key>
		<array/>
		<key>TimeOutAbortsMacro</key>
		<true/>
	</dict>
</array>
</plist>

actions.name: Move macro to a group
actions.script:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd">
<plist version="1.0">
<array>
	<dict>
		<key>ActionName</key>
		<string>Move macro to a group</string>
		<key>DisplayKind</key>
		<string>None</string>
		<key>IncludeStdErr</key>
		<false/>
		<key>MacroActionType</key>
		<string>ExecuteAppleScript</string>
		<key>Path</key>
		<string></string>
		<key>Text</key>
		<string>try
   
   ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   # User settings:
   ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   set moveToGroupName to "e:examples"
   ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   
   tell application "Keyboard Maestro"
      
      set macroSelectionList to selected macros
      
      if macroSelectionList = {} then
         error "No macros are selected!"
      end if
      
      # Disable any macros that are enabled.
      repeat with theMacro in macroSelectionList
         if enabled of theMacro is true then
            set enabled of theMacro to false
         end if
      end repeat
      
      move macroSelectionList to macro group moveToGroupName
      
   end tell
   
on error e number n
   set e to e & return & return & "Num: " & n
   if n ≠ -128 then
      try
         tell application (path to frontmost application as text) to set ddButton to button returned of ¬
            (display dialog e with title "ERROR!" buttons {"Copy Error Message", "Cancel", "OK"} ¬
               default button "OK" giving up after 30)
         if ddButton = "Copy Error Message" then set the clipboard to e
      end try
   end if
end try

------------------------------------------------------------------------------</string>
		<key>TimeOutAbortsMacro</key>
		<true/>
		<key>TrimResults</key>
		<true/>
		<key>TrimResultsNew</key>
		<true/>
		<key>UseText</key>
		<true/>
	</dict>
</array>
</plist>

actions.name: Select a macro group
actions.script:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd">
<plist version="1.0">
<array>
	<dict>
		<key>ActionName</key>
		<string>Select a macro group</string>
		<key>DisplayKind</key>
		<string>Window</string>
		<key>IncludeStdErr</key>
		<false/>
		<key>MacroActionType</key>
		<string>ExecuteAppleScript</string>
		<key>NotifyOnFailure</key>
		<false/>
		<key>Path</key>
		<string></string>
		<key>StopOnFailure</key>
		<false/>
		<key>Text</key>
		<string>try		---------------------------------------------------------------------------	# User Settings:	---------------------------------------------------------------------------	set macroGroupName to "sf:km - go to sf: groups"	---------------------------------------------------------------------------		tell application "Keyboard Maestro"				if macro group macroGroupName exists then			select macro group macroGroupName		else			error "Cannot select macro group " & macroGroupName & " — it is missing!"		end if			end tell	on error e number n	set e to e & return & return & "Num: " & n	if n ≠ -128 then		try			tell application (path to frontmost application as text) to set ddButton to button returned of ¬				(display dialog e with title "ERROR!" buttons {"Copy Error Message", "Cancel", "OK"} ¬					default button "OK" giving up after 30)			if ddButton = "Copy Error Message" then set the clipboard to e		end try	end ifend try

try
   
   tell application "System Events"
      tell application process "Keyboard Maestro"
         tell window "Keyboard Maestro Editor"
            tell scroll area 2 of splitter group 1 of group 1
               set focused to true
            end tell
         end tell
      end tell
   end tell
   
on error e number n
   set e to e & return & return & "Num: " & n
   if n ≠ -128 then
      try
         tell application (path to frontmost application as text) to set ddButton to button returned of ¬
            (display dialog e with title "ERROR!" buttons {"Copy Error Message", "Cancel", "OK"} ¬
               default button "OK" giving up after 30)
         if ddButton = "Copy Error Message" then set the clipboard to e
      end try
   end if
end try------------------------------------------------------------------------------</string>
		<key>TimeOutAbortsMacro</key>
		<true/>
		<key>TrimResults</key>
		<true/>
		<key>TrimResultsNew</key>
		<true/>
		<key>UseText</key>
		<true/>
	</dict>
</array>
</plist>
